What is the meaning of life, the universe and everything? We are!
god.author: Mike Hockney

god.quote: Religion without right knowledge of God is perilous.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: Faith is a fear of holy God.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: Prayer is a private communion with God.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: Right knowledge of God leads to renewal of mind.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: A repentant soul reconciled with God
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: If I could have done it myself, I would have already done it: pried open my ribs and etched the Word onto my heart’s beating chambers. But it seemed my ex-gay counselors were the only ones with enough skill and experience to wield the scalpel.
god.author: Garrard Conley

god.quote: Faith is firm belief in a faithful God.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: Your deepest craving is to find the Supreme Power. Nothing the world has to offer can satisfy it. This unsatisfaction can either lead you to Him or to some addiction.
god.author: Shunya

god.quote: God has blessed us with another year to be the best version of ourselves. 2020 was not easy but we pulled through and we have a chance to reflect and make 2021 great!
god.author: Hopal Green

god.quote: It would be GOD unless it blew your mind.
god.author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

god.quote: It wouldn’t be GOD unless you were totally mind blown.
god.author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

god.quote: If man created gods in his own image, or, put in other words, if gods took the form of human beings, then why shouldn’t the customs and practices of human society, overall, be equally applied to the domain of gods too?
god.author: Nihar Satpathy

god.quote: So why am I so reluctant to surrender to God? Why so slow to yield? Perhaps it is because I am not only in enemy-occupied territory, but because I am enemy-occupied territory.
god.author: Jean-Michel Hansen

god.quote: The sovereign God has bless mankind by giving us the Holy Scriptures.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: When God is silence, be still.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: When God is still, be silent.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: The names you have given to everything are not just names. They are the very fabric of the curtain which is separating you from God.
god.author: Shunya

god.quote: Salvation is a sovereignty of God.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: To Protect Me, My Dependents, My Country and My People, Even if it is an Elephant I will Stamp it
god.author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

god.quote: All gods feed on suffering. Without it, there are no prayers or offerings. Mankind is selfish. They give only when they have to. If this world was idyllic and life was just, what need would there be for gods?
god.author: Ilona Andrews

god.quote: Everything will be clear, when you are listening through the inner voice, the God's voice.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: God is in me, god is in you, you must find it.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: If you are smiling from the heart even in trouble, then trust me you are very close in finding god.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: TIPS TO CONNECT WITH GOD.---------1. Meditate Meditate and Meditate,-2. Believe in yourself - Be honest,-3. Stay holy, fall in love with yourself,-4. Listen to your heart and soul,-5. Do self talk in silence,-6. Follow the truth, and you get troubled now, fight with them keep following the truth,-7. Be fearless, never shake hand who seems wrong to you now,-8. Congratulations you are connected, Enjoy.---------
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: God awards supreme power to those who truly pray and whose intention is pure.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: If you are unable to experience god, then trust me you can't experience who you are.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: Find your center, yes I am talking about a circle through which you can see God, you can know God, you can hear God, thank you.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: If you believe God is there in you, you will find him, if you can't, you will never gonna find him.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: Once you receive blessings from God, he makes that person a mirror, everyone will get their true reflection.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: God! I feel like my life is yours, only yours.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: God can be experienced, god can be seen, god can be heard, it's all depends on your holiness.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: Once you surrender yourself to God, you become calm, humble, kind.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: If you’ve ever stood at the edge of a canyon and seen the birds swooping below you and the clouds stretched out over your head, or if you’ve ever stood in a field and felt a tiny rush of fear as you’ve watched a thunderstorm roll in over the horizon, then you know what this means. There is something about the grandeur of creation that calls out to the human heart, saying, "You are not all there is!
god.author: Greg Gilbert

god.quote: When Adam and Eve bit into the fruit, therefore, they weren’t just violating some arbitrary command, "Don’t eat the fruit." They were doing something much sadder and much more serious. They were rejecting God’s authority over them and declaring their independence from him. Adam and Eve wanted to be, as the Serpent promised them, "like God," so both of them seized on what they thought was an opportunity to shed the vice-regency and take the crown itself. In all the universe, there was only one thing God had not placed under Adam’s feet—God himself. Yet Adam decided this arrangement was not good enough for him, and so he rebelled.
god.author: Greg Gilbert

god.quote: Be fearless, accept the Gods creatures and humanity, try looking into intelligent self and learn from it.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: All right God, keep guiding me, I learned a new lesson today, and I think this is scripted by you to make me stronger, wiser, more humble, kinder, and so on.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: Once you are kind, God transmit magnetic power in you and people start to cling with you.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: Be as strong as possible and this will only happen when you believe in yourself, believe in God.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: Dear God, I have been suggested by you the path I am walking on, and it seems like full of struggle but the energy and positivity you have added in me is appreciated, and I am simply walking and it is making me stronger day by day.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: I wanted God to guide me in life and to shower a guiding light on me and he did it like a thunder.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: God's guidance: Be brave to stand alone even if the whole world seems going against you.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: Praise be to God, and trust yourself, I am sure and confident that your conscience will unite you with God.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: God will create the path for you, all you need is faith and courage to walk alone.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: God's Guidance: When nothing gets in your way, when all efforts fail, no matter how hard it is for you, be grateful for the opportunity to try again tomorrow.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: It is wise to worship God.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: Those who repent return to the righteous God.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: Beliefs and hopes are stairs to meet God, have faith in God and he will be with you one day.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: God Advice: Be who you are and say what you truly seeing, because those who hate you will immediately create negativity and those who are with you will celebrate after all truth is always bitter.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: You are whole today, God dwells in you, and he will grant you with higher divine power, stay humble, be thankful.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: There is no place for God in the world of knowledge. Because the essence of knowledge is doubt.
god.author: Bedrettin Simsek

god.quote: Trust in God at all times.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: God has no separate existence, everyone can attain God by walking in the right direction, the path of truth.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: The wisest thing that we can acknowledge is that we are not. The second wisest thing we can acknowledge is that God is. And the third wisest thing we can acknowledge is our need to surrender ourselves to both.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: We do not hold the solution to our problems, unless we see the destruction of ourselves as the solution to our problems.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: Being our own god grants us the terrifying illusion that we possess sufficient power to bring the world around us to its knees, when in fact it will only serve to bring us to our grave. And sadly, the cemeteries seem quite full these days.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: God has no interest in filling the holes within us. Rather, He wishes to eliminate them.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: We spend our lives shoveling all kinds of things into the hole within us. Yet the hole not only remains, it deepens with each shovel full. Therefore, the solution is neither shovel nor stuff. Rather, the solution is the God whose absence created the hole and who’s presence can eliminate it.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: Whoever loveth knows God, for God is love.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: If we doubt the faulty nature of the foundations that we create, we might ask if we’re currently standing on one, or are we sitting on the ground looking at the last one that collapsed. And since we’re already sitting, maybe we’d be smart to ponder that.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: There is no worship like waiting on God.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: God gave me life, I do not wish to waste it, God be my helper.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: Do not waste your life on worry but worship God.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: Do not worry but wait on God.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: Christianity is a religion built around a fatherWho does not rescue his son. It is the storyOf a son whose father is a ghost.
god.author: Terrance Hayes

god.quote: Art has been serving man’s notion of God since there have been hands to make it.
god.author: A.D. Aliwat

god.quote: He fell prey to a common fallacy. He wanted to philosophize, that is, to play God; for what is philosophy, in the end, but the desire to understand things to a degree greater than science permits?
god.author: Stanisław Lem

god.quote: The Holy Spirit was left here on earth to lead us into all truth. When we listen and follow the prompting of the Holy Spirit, we won't miss out on opportunities or open doors God sets before us.
god.author: Brenda Diann Johnson

god.quote: Another little test. God’s just full of ’em.
god.author: A.D. Aliwat

god.quote: Mind uses fancy phrases such as 'love' or 'unconditional' love to glorify its cravings. If you have indeed found the well of unconditional love inside you, you have found God.
god.author: Shunya

god.quote: Faith is a belief in faithful God.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: Faith is belief in a faithful God.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: Without prayer, we are powerless to project the image of the powerful God.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: There is a veil between you and God. Thoughts are like embroidery on that veil. People are doing more and more embroidery on your veil and making it more and more obscure.
god.author: Shunya

god.quote: Trust in God is real freedom.
god.author: A.D. Aliwat

god.quote: You can doubt but can't decieve God.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: I WOULD NEVER FORGIVE ME WHEN I AM NOT RIGHT OTHERWISE I DO FORGIVE ALL
god.author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

god.quote: KNOWLEDGE IS THE POWER, WISDOM IS THE LIGHT AND EDUCATION IS THE VISION
god.author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

god.quote: MY CONSCIENCE IS ALWAYS TO BRING INFRONT AN INFINITE HUMAN
god.author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

god.quote: God's faithfulness lies in his forgiveness.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: Have we ever considered that God is so enraptured with beginnings that He permits the pain of endings so that we can experience the exhilaration of beginnings?
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: God did not wait for us to believe in ourselves before He acted out of His belief in us.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: Dear Superwoman, Learn to cut off the things that cut off your communication with God.
god.author: Gift Gugu Mona

god.quote: When athletes go for the glory, they’re really going for God.
god.author: A.D. Aliwat

god.quote: The Spirit. That thing on loan from God, that thing He’ll eventually want back.
god.author: A.D. Aliwat

god.quote: There is no good without bad. No love without hate. If God wanted us to be perfect, incapable of sin, He would have made Adam perfect, incapable of sin, not with a rib that would eventually turn into a helpmeet capable of sin.
god.author: A.D. Aliwat

god.quote: Eve wasn’t evil. Like a lot of women in history, she just gets a bad rap. She was just doing what she was supposed to do during all that lapsarian business. And we’re all the better for it. Without Eve, there would have been no sin, and thus no need for Jesus. Without Jesus, God would be incomplete. And we wouldn’t know that He is really just a synonym for love.
god.author: A.D. Aliwat

god.quote: Dear Superwoman, It is hard to understand certain things all the time.Not every question will have an answer.So leave what you cannot answer, to the One Above.One day, He will give you the right answer.
god.author: Gift Gugu Mona

god.quote: Dear Superwoman, The best way to make it in life is by holding on to the Way Maker.
god.author: Gift Gugu Mona

god.quote: Prayer is a conscious decision to engage with God concerning essential matters of life.
god.author: Gift Gugu Mona

god.quote: Prayer is reaching out to God’s hand so that you can understand His heart and plans for your life.
god.author: Gift Gugu Mona

god.quote: Prayer is the ability to maintain a good connection between you and God.
god.author: Gift Gugu Mona

god.quote: How can he have fears for his future who knows that he is related to God, and that God is the same yesterday, and today, and forever?
god.author: Paul Brunton

god.quote: Only imagination, craziness can't make you a great personality, you must have courage, wisdom and the main favor of god and it can only be achieved by spirituality.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: Death precariously hangs a few scant inches over our heads, having been methodically placed there one piece at a time by a lifetime of choices that we have made. And until we understand the gravity of what hangs but a breath away, we will not understand why Jesus hung on a cross to sweep it all away.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: If you make God your strength, you will be strong.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: Easter tells us that God can raise anything that we can kill, including ourselves.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: If we feel dead inside, it’s likely because we’ve been on a killing rampage most of our lives. But we must remember that God is on a resurrection rampage as well, and He’s bent on taking that rampage right to the center of everything inside of us that we killed.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: God allows us to believe that something can’t be done so that He can show us how our ‘can’t’ is always His ‘can.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: Everything that God does is nothing that He needs done, for He is eternally complete. Yet, He is never still and He is forever working. Therefore, I am left with both the conviction and the evidence that God’s agenda is nothing other than that which is incomplete in you and I.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: Death is God’s opportunity, not our end.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: If we live solely within the scope of our sorely limited humanity, the word ‘end’ will mean nothing other than what it says. But if we dare to live within the scope of God’s eternal promises, every time the word ‘end’ appears the word ‘beginning’ will be hot on its heels.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: What’s so hard about believing in miracles? Afterall, aren’t miracles simply the things that we said couldn’t be done? And I must confess that I am far too small to be the authority on what can or can’t be done.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: What if the empty tomb was simply God saying that the miracle that happened there is just a foretaste of the miracles that can happen within us? And if that’s the case, nothing within us is really dead. Rather, it’s just a bunch of stuff waiting its turn to stand up and breathe again.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: I would ask two questions. The first is, "How is that which is dead within me any different from anything else that God has raised from the dead?" And the second question would be, "How is His passion to raise the dead within me any different than His passion to raise anything else that He has raised?" And the answer to both is "It is not and it is not." So, am I ready to be raised or am I not?
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: I don’t know if you’ve ever thought about this before, but if death is beaten, so is everything else. And because God set His sights on beating death, we can build our lives on achieving anything.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: If you view the claims of God as outrageous, it’s because your vision is far too tame and your apathy is way too strong.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: A dead man walking out of a tomb utterly obliterates all of our tediously constructed paradigms about life. And in pondering what God did that morning, maybe we need to ask if our paradigms are, in fact, the very tombs that you and I need to walk out of.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: Rule #1 - Put God at the center of everything. Rule #2 – Repeat. Rule #3 – Repeat after repeating.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: The greatest jail break in all of history occurred on Easter morning. Therefore, we must remember that whatever our prisons might be and however impenetrable they might appear, your jail break is just a prayer away.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: The hardest thing to give God is a dream that has defined us. Because when we give it, we have to acknowledge in our heart of hearts that we are trusting Him to define us instead of defining ourselves.
god.author: Sarah Holman

god.quote: You, over there. You, who’s always looking over his neighbour’s fence. The beauty of this world is wasted on you. I say, the beauty of this world is wasted on you. You use your eyes to cast disapproving looks. You use your tongue to degrade and denigrate. And worst of all, you use your dirty hands to reach into pockets, thinking happiness is found in coins. But happiness is the bird that will never fly near you, because it knows your desire to cage it—like you do with everything else. You cage love so two men can’t share it. You cage hope because you can’t stand faith. And you cage God so people think darkness is all there is. But the only thing you’ve successfully caged is your petty mind. I need you to know one thing: There will never be a cage to confine our light! We, here, we are free. Free to dream. Free to love. And free to be who we want to be.
god.author: Kamand Kojouri

god.quote: Once you found God, Allah and Jesus (by the way these all are one) the very first step is to surrender yourself to him, and then only you will have higher divine power.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: Whatever religion you are born in, be proud of it, by the way religions are divided by forms of god in different avatar, and it is created by god itself, so you have to accept it.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: If you can escape math and numbers or be behind it - you become godlike. In case you are human, everything you do or is done to you can be put into a number.
god.author: Thomas Vato

god.quote: The secular version of becoming godlike: be excellent. Why? Because people imagine gods as vastly excelled version of themselves. The more excellent, the more god.
god.author: Thomas Vato

god.quote: Pray to God, call to God, talk to God and then he will take you in his arms.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: Pray to God, call to God, talk to God and then he will take you on his lap.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: Religion is the opposite of freedom. God is a dictator.
god.author: Oliver Markus Malloy

god.quote: We are all connected! We are also individuals. We have our own individual selves here on this earth but there is a part of us that is connected to everyone and everything else. We are all ONE. Begin to move your awareness into this understanding and looking at everything around you as if it is part of you.
god.author: Rachel D. Greenwell

god.quote: You will look at the world differently when you see it as yourself. You will look at yourself differently when you see you as part of God. You will look at God differently when you look at God as everything.
god.author: Rachel D. Greenwell

god.quote: The soul, the spirit, God, consciousness, the Universe, or whatever you want to call it, YOU are A PART of it. NOT apart from it.
god.author: Rachel D. Greenwell

god.quote: Dumnezeu este cauza dintâi și scopul din urmă. Prin el, noi ne explicăm tot ce întrece puterea noastră de explicație și dăm un sens vieții.
god.author: George Călinescu

god.quote: There are oodles of doubts in the name God. Is He?
god.author: Mecha Constantine

god.quote: The greatest gift one can receive from god is craziness towards your goal, without it you can't succeed.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: Avoid anger, ego, jealousy and greed, don't be a coward, fight for justice, follow the truth, spread love and then I am sure and confident that you will find God, Allah, and Jesus, but it is not possible for everyone.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: The nameless cannot be grasped by the intellect repeating the scriptures fastidiously, but with the willful surrender of a tender heart soaked in love and devotion.
god.author: Meeta Ahluwalia

god.quote: Realizing that ‘possession’ is an illusion finally liberates us to possess something that is never an illusion and is always liberating; and that is the reality that we are God’s cherished possession. Therefore, life is not about acquiring possessions. Rather, it’s about being one.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: The invention of the devil. If we are possessed by the devil, it cannot be by one, for then we should live, at least here on earth, quietly, as with God, in unity, without contradiction, without reflection, always sure of the man behind us. His face would not frighten us, for as diabolical beings we would, if somewhat sensitive to the sight, be clever enough to prefer to sacrifice a hand in order to keep his face covered with it. If we were possessed by only a single devil, one who had a calm, untroubled view of our whole nature, and freedom to dispose of us at any moment, then that devil would also have enough power to hold us for the length of a human life high above the spirit of God in us, and even to swing us to and fro, so that we should never get to see a glimmer of it and therefore should not be troubled from that quarter. Only a crowd of devils could account for our earthly misfortunes. Why don’t they exterminate one another until only a single one is left, or why don’t they subordinate themselves to one great devil? Either way would be in accord with the diabolical principle of deceiving us as completely as possible. With unity lacking, of what use is the scrupulous attention all the devils pay us? It simply goes without saying that the falling of a human hair must matter more to the devil than to God, since the devil really loses that hair and God does not. But we still do not arrive at any state of well-being so long as the many devils are within us.
god.author: Franz Kafka

god.quote: God is enough.
god.author: Sayam Asjad

god.quote: Events do not reflect God's choices. They happen at random, and randomness is another name for chaos… And chaos is evil; not wrong, not malevolent, but evil nonetheless.
god.author: Harold S. Kushner

god.quote: Lead you not into temptation? Got it. And what else would you like me not to do? – God
god.author: John Alejandro King a.k.a. The Covert Comic

god.quote: The greatest act of strength is to acknowledge that we have none. The greatest act of faith is to believe that our weakness is God’s strength. And the greatest act of courage is to act on these realities.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: God does not send us because of who we are, but because of who He can be through us.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: Do we actually think that we have the power to subjugate evil and wrestle it into blind obedience as some whipped puppy? For if evil can convince us of this, it has ‘subjugated’ us and ‘wrestled’ us into blind obedience without us having any idea that we just got whipped.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: We must not rest until we have receive what we have ask of the Lord God.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: God requires all men to repent.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: Sometimes all you need is God and be scientific, and you will do great things.
god.author: Emmanuel Apetsi

god.quote: Gândul la Dumnezeu este un obstacol sinuciderii, dar nu morții. El nu imblanzeste deloc întunericul de care se va fi speriat Dumnezeu pe vremea când își caută pulsul prin teroarea nimicului...
god.author: Emil Cioran

god.quote: God is 'Common' to the Uncommon Humans
god.author: Syed Sharukh

god.quote: How lavishly are the flowers scattered over the face of the earth! One of the most perfect and delightful works of the Creation, there is yet no other form of beauty so very common. Abounding in different climates, upon varying soils -not a few here to cheer the sad, a few there to reward the good but countless in their throngs, infinite in their variety, the gift of measureless beneficence wherever man may live, there grow the flowers.
god.author: Susan Fenimore Cooper

god.quote: I never say anything by guessing, God has empowered me to see the person's, situation, spiritually / fully.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: If you are lucky enough to find God, you will be lifted up at any challenges.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: Strength is what is granted to me by God so that He might show through me what He wishes to do through others.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: Do you believe in God, Aunt Elner?"Sure I do, honey, why?"How old were you when you started believing, do you remember?"Aunt Elner paused for a moment. "I never thought about not believing. Never did question it. I guess believing is just like math: some people get it right out of the chute, and some have to struggle for it. (...) Oh, I know a lot of people struggle, wondering is there really a God. They sit and think and worry over it all their life. The good Lord had to make smart people but I don’t think he did them any favors because it seems the smart ones start questioning things from the get go. But I never did. I’m one of the lucky ones. I thank God every night, my brain is just perfect for me, not too dumb, not too bright. You know, your daddy was always asking questions."He was?"I remember one day he said, ‘Aunt Elner, how do you know there is a God, how can you be sure?’ "What did you tell him?"I said, ‘Well, Gene, the answer is right on the end of your fingertips.’ He said, ‘What do you mean?’ I said, ‘Well, think about it. Every single human being that was ever born from the beginning of time has a completely different set of fingerprints. Not two alike. Not a single one out of all the billions is ever repeated.’ I said, ‘Who else but God could think up all those different patterns and keep coming up with new ones year after year, not to mention all the color combinations of all the fish and birds.’ "Dena smiled. "What did he say?"He said, ‘Yes, but, Aunt Elner, how do you know that God’s not repeating old fingerprints from way back and reusing them on us?’ " She laughed. "See what I mean? Yes, God is great, all right. He only made one mistake but it was a big one."What was that?"Free will. That was his one big blunder. He gave us a choice whether or not to be good or bad. He made us too independent … and you can’t tell people what to do; they won’t listen. You can tell them to be good until you’re blue in the face but people don’t want to be preached at except at church, where they know what they are getting and are prepared for it."What’s life all about, Aunt Elner? Don’t you ever wonder what the point of the whole thing is?"No, not really; it seems to me we only have one big decision in this life, whether to be good or bad. That’s what I came up with a long time ago. Of course, I may be wrong, but I’m not going to spend any time worrying over it, I’m just going to have a good time while I’m here. Live and let live.
god.author: Fannie Flagg

god.quote: The Lord is eternal God.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: Those who teaches or preaches the word of God, might be scammers, thieves and fraudster. They might be scamming and tricking people, but don’t get it twisted. The word of God is not a scam and God is not a scam.2 Peter 2:1-3Luke 4:8 Rev 1:8Hebrew 4:12
god.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

god.quote: All worship God, but by worshiping God only, God cannot be found.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: If you are a self-believer, you will find God.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: God helps those who fall and dare to rise again.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: If God didn’t design the road, you can be assured that it’s a very short path to a really steep cliff.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: Of necessity, our imagination must embrace the dark reality of ‘what is’ as a precursor to ‘what could be.’ For then and only then will we see in the darkness of today the certain light of tomorrow.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: If I presume the flood that engulfs me to be bigger than the God who surrounds me, the real flood is the absence of my faith.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: How many times have the obstacles consumed my attention and crushed my vision? And at the point that I have been so frightened so as to have made something that big, I have at the same time made God something terribly little.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: We will never rise on the wings of our own ingenuity or wisdom, for those are the things that lift nothing other than our ego in the process of crashing our lives. Rather, it is the surrender of the smallness of self to the enormity of God that allows us to soar.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: You do not need to punish anyone, you should leave everything to god.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: God is the water of the soul. Yet, with man there is only the rumor of water and the reality of sand. And our response to this reality is a steady diet of sand because we live in a steady state of stubbornness regarding the God of water.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: In the beginning was the World, but it was, therefore the past existed before the World. He bowed before the supremacy of the past. The Catholic Church would have much to be said for it, but it allowed too little past. Two thousand years, a part of it only recorded, what does that matter compared to traditions of double or treble that space of years? A Catholic priest is surpassed by any Egyptian mummy. Because the mummy is dead, he may think himself superior. But the pyramids are no more dead than St. Peter's, on the contrary, they are much more alive, for they are older. These Romans think that they have all time in the pockets. They refuse to revere their ancestors. That is a blasphemy. God is the past... A time will come when all men will beat their senses into recollections, and all time into the past. A time will come when a single past will embrace all men when there will be nothing except the past, when everyone will have one faith– the past.
god.author: Elias Canetti

god.quote: The people who raised me will say that I am not religious. They are mistaken. What I am not is observant. But I am painfully, cripplingly, incurably, miserably religious, and I have watched lately, dumbfounded and distraught, as around the world, more and more people seem to be finding Gods, each one more hateful and bloodthirsty than the next, as I'm doing my best to lose Him. I'm failing miserably.
god.author: Shalom Auslander

god.quote: It occurred to me that maybe it wasn't so much that my father on Earth was like my Father in Heaven, but that my Father in Heaven was like my father on Earth. That maybe if God gave you a test that He thought you could pass, He got really pissed off if you failed—not because you failed, but because He didn't like being wrong. And maybe when God got pissed off, He made his way downstairs to Earth, kicked in the door to your world, and threatened to break your goddamn arms. Or your goddamn heart. Or whatever else he could get His goddamn hands on.
god.author: Shalom Auslander

god.quote: FAILURE IS UNDER YOUR FEET UNTIL SUCCESS IS NOT OVER YOUR HEAD
god.author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

god.quote: DO NOT SHOW ME YOUR PATH WHICH IS NOT TO MY DESTINATION
god.author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

god.quote: THE 'LAST MONDAY' OF MARGAZHI MONTH WILL BE CELEBRATED AS MY BIRTHDAY GLOBALLY SINCE 1978, LORD TIRUMAAL SRI MURUGA PERUMAL
god.author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

god.quote: Prayer to God helps us to fight every difficulty.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: Remember, God will repeat the same way you use to treat others.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: Dear Shiva/ God/ Allah or whatever you want to call upon! I wish that I could find a way to become self reliant.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: For love may reach God in this life, but knowledge may not.
god.author: Anonymous

god.quote: God gifts a religious men / women the ability to see what is happening.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: Obedience to God without full surrender is an exercise in robotically following the rules. Surrendering to God without obedience is faith with zero works.
god.author: Marsha DuCille

god.quote: God always walks before you (to make a way); walks beside you (to keep you strong); and walks behind you (to catch you if you fall).
god.author: Marsha DuCille

god.quote: The phrase as weak as a baby doesn’t apply in the kingdom of God, for when the Lord wants to accomplish a mighty work, He often starts by sending a baby. This was true when He sent Isaac, Joseph, Samuel, John the Baptist, and especially Jesus. God can use the weakest things to defeat the mightiest enemies (1 Cor. 1: 25–29). A baby’s tears were God’s first weapons in His war against Egypt (p. 21).
god.author: Warren W. Wiersbe

god.quote: Justice for a man comes only from a just God.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: Every perfect gift comes from God.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: Deep down all souls are innocent but they're caught up in a ruthless game.
god.author: Shunya

god.quote: ALL kinds of criminals, except infidels, meet death with reasonable serenity. As a rule, there is nothing in the death of a pirate to cast any discredit on his profession. The murderer upon the scaffold, with a priest on either side, smilingly exhorts the multitude to meet him in heaven. The man who has succeeded in making his home a hell, meets death without a quiver, provided he has never expressed any doubt as to the divinity of Christ, or the eternal "procession" of the Holy Ghost. The king who has waged cruel and useless war, who has filled countries with widows and fatherless children, with the maimed and diseased, and who has succeeded in offering to the Moloch of ambition the best and bravest of his subjects, dies like a saint.All the believing kings are in heaven—all the doubting philosophers in perdition. All the persecutors sleep in peace, and the ashes of those who burned their brothers, sleep in consecrated ground. Libraries could hardly contain the names of the Christian wretches who have filled the world with violence and death in defence of book and creed, and yet they all died the death of the righteous, and no priest, no minister, describes the agony and fear, the remorse and horror with which their guilty souls were filled in the last moments of their lives.These men had never doubted—they had never thought—they accepted the creed as they did the fashion of their clothes. They were not infidels, they could not be—they had been baptized, they had not denied the divinity of Christ, they had partaken of the "last supper." They respected priests, they admitted that Christ had two natures and the same number of wills; they admitted that the Holy Ghost had "proceeded," and that, according to the multiplication table of heaven, once one is three, and three times one is one, and these things put pillows beneath their heads and covered them with the drapery of peace.They admitted that while kings and priests did nothing worse than to make their fellows wretched, that so long as they only butchered and burnt the innocent and helpless, God would maintain the strictest neutrality; but when some honest man, some great and tender soul, expressed a doubt as to the truth of the Scriptures, or prayed to the wrong God, or to the right one by the wrong name, then the real God leaped like a wounded tiger upon his victim, and from his quivering flesh tore his wretched soul.
god.author: Robert G. Ingersoll

god.quote: There is grandeur in this view," scolds a quote from Darwin hanging over my dad’s desk at his lab. The words are written in looping brown calligraphy, enclosed in a varnished wooden frame. The quote comes from the last sentence of *On the Origin of Species*. It is Darwin’s sweet nothing, his apology for deflating the world of its God, his promise that there is grandeur—if you look hard enough, you’ll find it. But sometimes it felt like an accusation. If you can’t see it, shame on you.
god.author: Lulu Miller

god.quote: Today we thank God for all the blessings He has bestowed upon this great Country and ask Him to continue to heal our land and meet our needs - and we do so through the power of prayer. Nick Rahall
god.author: Nick Rahall

god.quote: Grow in grace by the knowledge of God.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: The only way to be close to God is to know the truth and spread love all around.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: I consider all religions the same, I believe in God, Allah, Jesus and peace.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: Se davvero l'essere umano fosse stato creato da Dio" diceva mio marito, "credi che Dio si sarebbe inventato una cosa volgare come la merda? Non avrebbe trovato un altro metodo, uno che non comportasse gli esiti ripugnanti della digestione? La merda è una trovata così perversa che o Dio è un perverso oppure non esiste.
god.author: Rosella Postorino

god.quote: Wisdom apart from God is just a word.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: The Bible is not a book on how to live your life. It’s a book on how to live above your life.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: Sometimes the path is hidden by the foliage that surrounds us, the trees that have fallen all around us, and the winds that whip the wilderness wild. And while the foliage and the trees and the winds might hide that precious path for a moment, we must remember that God birthed each of us with a destination so utterly amazing that no wilderness possesses the foliage, or the trees, or the winds to ever destroy the path to that destination.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: God is faithful to forgive sin, if sin is forsaken.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: The powerful God alone gives perfect gifts.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: القراءة البعيدة عن مخافة الله تصنع منا مسخ يزداد شرا كلما قرأ سطرا
god.author: Hany Adeeb

god.quote: Good luck trying to really understand the words of a book full of contradictions and nutty claptrap about things like shellfish and slavery and homosexuality. Concepts quite removed from the simple unconditional love of God.
god.author: A.D. Aliwat

god.quote: It’s about love. Plain and simple. That’s God: love. And it transcends mere goodness.
god.author: A.D. Aliwat

god.quote: God’s love is unconditional love. Love despite our faults. Lucky for us, we’re bad.
god.author: A.D. Aliwat

god.quote: I don’t want people’s beliefs and opinions about God. I want true knowledge of the true God. We all want the real thing though, don’t we? Deep down, we all crave the Absolute Truth, not just some nice, liberal idea that we think might make the world a better place. I don’t want to talk to my own unconscious, or my own subjective beliefs, then call it "God" … because it makes me feel good. I want to actually talk to God. I want the answers to all the big questions. I want to know what it’s really all about. What am I supposed to do with my life? How am I supposed to live? What’s the right thing to do? What’s the meaning of life? What’s the purpose of each and every one of us? What are the big explanations for everything? Is there a way to get all the way through to God, the true God?
god.author: Spiro Hamilton

god.quote: When you rewind everything, back to the state prior to the Big Bang, you reach the Source … God.
god.author: Spiro Hamilton

god.quote: We all have the capacity to link to God. We can all execute an archetypal God Program that will give us access to the divine. That’s because we ourselves are part of the divine. We are cells of God. God is made from us. It’s time to get jacked into God. In fact, we already are, if we did but know it. It’s time to make use of that connection. It’s time for us all to become God. Are your ready?
god.author: Spiro Hamilton

god.quote: God is about love. But it is a perfect, pure love. There must be some justice in that. Order. We’re supposed to do right, not wrong. Like you said, we are made bad, Ray. And that is why it is so important to be good. At all times. Being good requires sacrifice. People can’t just do what they want all the time, occasionally do some nice things for others on their own terms, call themselves loving, and still join God in heaven. You don’t get to make up the rules.
god.author: A.D. Aliwat

god.quote: The sun will one day die. But love cannot die. God cannot die.
god.author: A.D. Aliwat

god.quote: It can be said that the sun shines for us. That it and everything else were made by God for us.
god.author: A.D. Aliwat

god.quote: The living God is the fountain of all waters.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: Your well-being is the wealth God has given you.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: That with him the set times of prayer were not different from other times: that he retired to pray, according to the directions of his Superior, but that he did not want such retirement. nor ask for it, because his greatest business did not divert him from GOD.
god.author: Brother Lawrence

god.quote: If we want to expand the hole in our lives left by the absence of God, fill it will everything that won’t.
god.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

god.quote: Love each other as the Creator of Everything loves: unconditionally.
god.author: Tara Bianca

god.quote: If you know people who are suffering, love them. Truly be of service. Even something as simple as a smile is loving and may be the only love or kindness gifted to them that day. Hug them, see them, love them, accept them unconditionally.
god.author: Tara Bianca

god.quote: Unconditional loving friendship is the foundation for all relationships.
god.author: Tara Bianca

god.quote: Every time I access unconditional love for another, I am blessed. Every time I hug someone, I am blessed. Every time I unconditionally hold space for another’s suffering, I am blessed.
god.author: Tara Bianca

god.quote: Your most important job as a parent, or as a friend to a child, is to mentor children in a field of unconditional love and acceptance. Your gift is to see the rightness in them and reflect it back. You are the witness of the Divine in them.
god.author: Tara Bianca

god.quote: Unconditional love never expects the other to be different than they are. Nor does it place a person below another.
god.author: Tara Bianca

god.quote: I am here to remind you that beautiful Divine mentorship is available to you. God created you and knows you intimately. God awaits your remembrance of the Everlasting Unconditional Love that is God.
god.author: Tara Bianca

god.quote: Everything that exists is the surrender of God to you. Everything that exists is the Divine loving Creation. God is unconditional love. God allows everything, witnesses it and still loves us. Even when you think you are lost, broken, or alone, God is there with you, loving you, beckoning you to return to Love. However, God does not force you to love God. The Divine patiently, beautifully, and humbly asks at your feet, "May I love you?
god.author: Tara Bianca

god.quote: You are the creation of God. You are the beauty of God. There is not one wrinkle, hair, nail, or cell that was not created by the Divine. God is the master architect, sculptor, and admirer of you and of creation Itself. If you look at a wrinkle on your face, that is the Love of God written upon you. The curves, the contours, the space surrounding you, the masterful etching is the deep story of you. Here, there, and everywhere, God knows you, knows Creation.
god.author: Tara Bianca

god.quote: When you approach Divinity, you become like the Divine in that your heart is oriented toward unconditionally serving humanity. You end up aligned with the Will of God, which in this case is about bringing everyone home to God in the fullness of our Divinity.
god.author: Tara Bianca

god.quote: God is everywhere. God can be in anything. Anyone. God is God—omnipotent, omnipresent.
god.author: A.D. Aliwat

god.quote: Hell mostly just means being separated from God.
god.author: A.D. Aliwat

god.quote: I asked God: Who am I to the universe?Why do i exist?God said: You are a part of this universe, actually your mind is and you are leading it too.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: There is no passion like the pursuit of God.
god.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

god.quote: No one can mess to him/her, who is a devotee of God, God himself use to help, guide, take care of that person.
god.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

god.quote: And don't tell me God works in mysterious ways,' Yossarian continued, hurtling on over her objection. 'There's nothing so mysterious about it. He's not working at all. He's playing. Good God, how much reverence can you have for a Supreme Being who finds it necessary to include such phenomena as phlegm and tooth decay in His divine system of creation? What in the world was running through that warped, evil, scatological mind of His when He robbed old people of the power to control their bowel movements? Why in the world did He ever create pain?
god.author: Joseph Heller

god.quote: Nacarat Room PoemsMay 24, 2012thursdaySightless SubstanceGhosts with no substance flit across my mind,Jiggle they the knob, keys seek they to find.They with no substance, spirits that are no more,Want to enter in through memories closed door.Shadows now shifting, no longer with meaning,Rattle the windows in their unseemly seemings.The past heaves upon my somber, tired soul,And all my days do they quietly show.Memories ache and love draws deep,Upon my entrenched soul and my tower keep.Oh immortal with a mortal’s bound soul,Emptiness within, its fullness does know.And I a fool to the time at hand,My day fades away in the timeless land.Give me this day Your daily bread,So that I may not sojourn in the land of the dead.Let me not grasp an empty hand,But let us walk forth, God and man.
god.author: Douglas Laurent

god.quote: It’s time to transform the world. Only positive liberty can produce the necessary alchemy. Why should humanity be content with being free from interference? Why doesn’t it want to become something wondrous? How do you become a god? By being left alone, left to your own devices? Or do you become a god when the State invests everything in you, and provides the framework, the machinery, for producing gods? The State can make you a god. You cannot make yourself a god. There are no gods on desert islands. It’s time to trust the State. It’s time to allow the State to engineer your metamorphosis. It’s time to become what you truly are … an authentic god.
god.author: Joe Dixon

god.quote: Don’t be a despairing Russian soldier. Never give up. Never lie down in the snow and wait for the end. Understand this – you are a perpetual motion machine. You will go on forever. Once you fully understand that the purpose of Groundhog Day is to turn you into God an infinite number of times, how could you not find that the greatest news of all? No God could have whispered gladder tidings to you.

We are all agents of God’s rediscovery. We are all becoming God.
